glsa.title: Asterisk: Multiple Vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Asterisk, the worst of which could lead to Denial of Service.

background.p: Asterisk is an open source telephony engine and toolkit.

description.p: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities have been discovered in Asterisk. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could exploit the vulnerabilities to cause a man in the middle attack or cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Asterisk users should upgrade to the latest version:
